body:
@Baruda
Question, is there a reason why a group can't just translate it even if Fakku has it translated already? I mean, I can understand if Fakku is trying to take down someone using their translations but what if some other group decided to translate it instead? Maybe that can group can leave the censorship in place to make it clear to Fakku that it's not stealing their work.
Yep, guy below me is right, you can only find his old work on nhentai in english. New stuff is mostly on fakku

Yep, this is another artist that has shit tons of great works but, nevertheless, they are mostly NOT TL'd in English but a lot are in Chinese OR probably under FAKKU or Irodori or some other manga pay site... Sadge.
holy milf, this need translation asap
